sentences.sContent: Food prices quadrupled during the war.
sentences.sCn: 战争期间食品价格翻了两番。

sentences.sContent: The company has quadrupled its profits in just three years.
sentences.sCn: 公司利润在短短三年里增长至原来的四倍。

remMethod.val: quadru(四) + ple(加) → 加四次 → 成四倍

trans.tranOther: to increase and become four times as big or as high, or to make something increase in this way
